com.majeur.preferencekit

Class BottomWidgetPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.preference.Preference
      • com.majeur.preferencekit.Preference
        • com.majeur.preferencekit.BottomWidgetPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<android.preference.Preference>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtraButtonsPreference, RadioPreference, SeekBarPreference, SpinnerPreference

    public class BottomWidgetPreference
extends Preference
    Preference that provide a way to add a widget as a second row of the preference.
    See Also:
    SeekBarPreference}, SpinnerPreference}
